channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Curam Social Program Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Curam Social Program Management

item.title: CVE-2021-39068|2024-08-04T01:58:17.987Z -- ibm -- curam%20social%20program%20management
item.description: IBM Curam Social Program Management 8.0.1 and 7.0.11 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 215306.
